original_title: Liverpool FC: The Greatest Premiership Game Ever
overview: The night of the greatest Premiership game ever. Expectations were high, but no one could have predicted a match of such skill, excitement and high drama. Little did anyone know that this game would become the stuff of legend. Liverpool matched Newcastle blow for blow, and won the game in the most sensational of circumstances in the dying seconds.
title: Liverpool FC: The Greatest Premiership Game Ever
